### LAST OVER TIME
Calculates the latest value of a field, where recency determined by the `@timestamp` field.

```esql
TS k8s
| STATS max_cost=max(last_over_time(network.cost)) BY cluster, time_bucket = bucket(@timestamp,1minute)
```
